data.description: Charming, updated home on 3.91 acres in Denton! Right off of HWY 49, only minutes from Asheboro, Thomasville, and Badin Lake! New floors throughout -LVT in living areas, carpet in bedrooms, tile in bathrooms. Kitchen is brand new - including cabinets, granite, and stainless appliances (refrigerator remains!). Updated bathrooms. New windows! Newer metal roof! Large bedrooms! Covered storage area in carport, and storage building in back yard. Make your appointment today! Listing realtor related to seller.
